SMITH v. BARBOUR* No. COA04-792, COA04-1144 North Carolina Court of Appeals Filed May 17, 2005 Certification Date June 6, 2005 Appeal from Wake (01CVD2256).

Consolidated in one opinion

Case reported without published opinion. Affirmed in COA04-792; Affirmed in part, vacated in part, and remanded in COA04-1144.
